skyux_grid_clear_all._description: Label for the checkbox in a grid to clear all selected items.

skyux_grid_only_show_selected_items._description: Label for the checkbox in a grid to only show selected items.

skyux_grid_select_all._description: Label for the checkbox in a grid to select all items.

skyux_grid_select_row._description: Label for the checkbox in a grid to select a row.
